name: CricketTeller
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The skill gives the user the latest update from the cricketing world on a daily basis. It reads from the various RSS feeds available about the news. Ranging from world cup matches to various IPL matches that may take place!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
